channel.title: RuneKingdom | Progressive Oldschool Server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/FBB5rGV.gif?1[/img]
Welcome to RuneKingdom
Home Page: http://runekingdom.com/
Forums: http://runekingdom.com/forums/
Highscores: http://hiscores.runekingdom.com/
Vote For Us: http://vote.runekingdom.com/#?step=1
Most Recent Update: http://runekingdom.com/forums/index.php?/topic/17603-march-4th-pets-misc/#comment-143640 (Boss Pets)
Upcoming Updates: GWD, Kill Counters, Barbarian Assault, and loads more!
Rune Kingdom is not just any normal old school server. 317? I think not. Try 459. This true old school server has a very strategic thought out economy that is flowing beautifully at the moment. Also, you see the word "Custom" in here, but these aren't the same custom updates that you'll see on custom servers. The server started with a 2006 base and nothing on it, everything has been built from scratch and it has been built to last for years and years to come. All the servers missing are you players! :D Come join in the fun and get involved with the best community around! RK all the way!
Things this server contains:
21 functioning skills such as:
[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/F4lrYyD71lT3MRZa0By6K0QG96NluOHYaOmzALZlEpL9i26j1HGwJVP_OOTa54lJqyXgGjGO6w-OV8APFX9aM8GSXLJQkZRAmhPy1Z3cctd_LeZgG4fFXZax2cu9WJ5ju-q71GRY[/img]
[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/DaUZJSHX122Up4ouZjwk65F01CeUEDKbn1WJ-de2qcwV-V9lh4q_kCYMj3FVMXcNvhsX8Pp1x6ExwdNGkDe4iYLJqivoEdqir1uHuL360fDN-snZdRH_6piD5-xnSSpEbKSHFaOL[/img]
[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/LEzkHZTQXkdNeL8Bvs_o9L_nNwN1Q6wyHp88YXkFjgy4Pna3oChYykP9xv0ug5emqtABfDq1Oa_2JiCv7WRypsFGdpqWZPezV74EPxEkXmQiAL3iGOu_sKcevqvEnoA7BTtLKAL5[/img]
3 Slayer Masters (For Tasks):
Turael being the lowest and Duradel being the highest.
[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/m2X9fX1u2jCWnrBx39xqMW57Xu4f5HJRbwzWuIp8uEydRiZ68HLWVvK9J6BYv8OkPF8oxg1taESPLn8PnszTw9aznYMBc9hbybRpLZ-z09rwjKINTTKoxHz1tLLZpAqyFBzh92kg[/img]
A slayer shop with different rewards [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/zahNG3rTXaVOFQtnpx93GCNa14D1TCctIkLhcNT7uIFXsLxbCzgdcoLbkCvXgwcrGEy5glXtIbuqj3Trofg3Q13jEehHus0de-QMwZ7biPGh_doLUCS3aQdL5svSjHXMnE5-N0-x[/img]
A giant fairy to spend your vote points on! [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/WvE6SkN03sr8T5XVn0lv_yO5A99UWZOfbmRmDkbwNS_bK4llQc6JM2ukiIa7z4jCnJyX1RLFEDK6BCFT-dPbjLS-doKKOoesqoc93EO8kJLRpfcInN2sU_3vSOuNiw2mV_AXc7gX[/img]
With a store to go with it ;) [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/YM8O_fJ-M3PeCE2yJshOim82prJD85HatL6SmFbZiOl38Xv3F4SceP4EuvWsOfqqKwB5DPV_Oi76XWqBNOM01eh831EWZhs6Sovqn2qW7gHMfP0p2g43U0IZyzjAYMrVO1U-5txM[/img]
Higher Tier Prayer - [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/ixqZmKXNqZdha-K6gRTreY-1WUCz-c-I-waK3lOyGodpB6ueupm_XMoZ4KKNieM_siSRhf_-nzhV3yH0jZj-8NTyRvC7NI2I2WuKQPFXNcmPBfUbbKgTtYGgvgdWBJe-fxYA6AL4[/img]
Xp Counter- [img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/d4GYS8pr38xmBQE1nCa-57MVB-8gDbmwYCQNZgEllVRPEdvmp4OSwazs8T65lo2qrzKwiYCF5dfwz-Q_g-0ub4OscH7rXtO7xHmJ6M9-Nj-GxBE7zg5x_D_5RwPuc5-KvxjkfWTg[/img]
Perfectly Working Vengence - [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/0m5-b9AvfFOKdZ1jw2HcxoQ-3AwC5qtOZe76eSBKwPvcCN4TGcR6mjxsNwAolDkKNsBtwsl3VzVEE2PG5CIdB5OjC0uqAyE_Wah_hpbYTbfPk_cZV4Q5L225FKYHr6SoKcFtyp6p[/img]
A Fun Defenders Minigame - [img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/RuYCob0U8eWOmhMxvg-AAkv-SQuCnQKCs2MHoMvczZJJpxiipSSXq9SG4GmIdXIc_bpNXx8JjBxE1JvxoxGzasee1u6E7IU1E4bdgxkZeXJgNtoR8xisPUC4sdn2ry2vi-XSJ3fS[/img]
Custom voting area with unique drops! [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/vEUpBaoZMqRdU1R14Ares4RwBsKxN8OxGoCKbjWwAK2wf0TBJQB8lnrz-yh2VYd3VJ35b2ziW7aHVu2MjV7R-nPxKbXUimD-dmBhLpBbhBoOH7-LjElqGgyu10Fpo4C61jHsz2Un[/img]
A set of slayer monster pets have been added that you can collect from slayer tower using a soul collector! Be sure to collect all of them!
Soul Collector: [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/GZEGakGnf8AVRRStWyaUWd8DbX_FuR9AJJfsxYjBp7ZVvdtRb8AfAwc3Oq4u_jZDSJOGh14jhSA_NLhKU_GoQsphC44ILZavLbkOU2p-QWPSS8A9LGrlemKWTTJj36wCkLz2_fyt[/img] Here are just a few of the ones that you can collect: [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/64sbXHTEoBIXCnRaR4VqGAuY5LcmbGCzXe-UZ2sNzLPQk4dnjfyUME1OgrBoZ9Vjtos5717wZYNZI_xRYJ35ciBi-3bQiuoC-DUht5UkUJJ3A8uCq0KhRdZnc3ZIq9R2xeTFY001[/img] Boss Pets - [img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/04RlNMMwZ1GTOQsw0MslvEzYVy0R6-xHrfK0w_8N4SkIqao_jcprEsR8Ac3m4qKLH1UqSMlHoRAqzyeN9tZU423AHDC9N_6S-YZOOWmGawdwAG5w8yaP5O_RAbrhlE7P-yuH4KBI[/img]
Gilded Altar - [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/XRPSzpZwxdSIOjZKHeejChD-lXQhQ67U0N5jRM5H50FU9sIoMVJw7BEj3uVgPboolfJ7kYfnd8oSP59M76pQpOun8vvCmkPjf96K91N7lDVdMjPro3PNePT4h7R6FRv9mGegmVle[/img]
A bunch of customs and rares
[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/1Y-Mzi-Qa1ABLkl203X7_p-L_4_WvsFU3ed7dQeR4hhB2EEKMCnGfQ-IfvOzLAv5ulqAXEh2zb3bc6jEVKOoqegE3B--TBjQhWGJlx88_BbRjZJ9mBIIHEs5-JSlu5m_NZLZg6jj[/img]
And GODWARS is coming very soon! Make it before the update! :D
Join all the fun on RuneKingdom =) www.runekingdom.com[/center]
